author: Angus Loten
title: CIOs Face Growing Challenges of User Data Governance
text:
Recent scrutiny around ’s practices has raised questions surrounding the handling of user data, a long-simmering issue for chief information officers at any firm that collects information from its customers, clients or employees, says TBM Council founder Chris Pick. “What’s changed is that Facebook is a useful tool for legislatures to understand how their constituents […]
